mapper.insert: insert into goods (gid, one, two, three, brand, title, description,discount, price, pro_code,color, size, im) value (#{gid},#{one},#{two},#{three},#{brand},#{title},#{description},#{discount},#{price},#{pro_code},#{color},#{size},#{im})
mapper.update: update goods set one=#{one}, two=#{two}, three=#{three}, brand=#{brand}, title=#{title}, description=#{description}, discount=#{discount}, price=#{price}, pro_code=#{pro_code}, size=#{size}, im=#{im} where gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select im from goods where gid = #{gid}
